thread.title: Resident Evil Revelations comes out on PS4 and Xbox One this autumn
thread.title_full: Resident Evil Revelations comes out on PS4 and Xbox One this autumn

title: Resident Evil Revelations comes out on PS4 and Xbox One this autumn
text:
Resident Evil Revelations comes out on PS4 and Xbox One this autumn Setting sail. By Wesley Yin-Poole   
Resident Evil Revelations is coming out on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One this autumn, Capcom has announced. 
That's both physical and digital in Europe and North America, the company confirmed on Twitter. Resident Evil Revelations is coming to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One physical and digital (NA and EU) Fall 2017! More information coming soon. pic.twitter.com/RnhFbk3xvE â€” Resident Evil (@RE_Games) March 13, 2017 
Revelations first came out in January 2012 on the Nintendo 3DS, before a HD version was released on PC, PS3, Wii U and Xbox 360 in 2013. 
It takes place between the events of Resi 4 and Resi 5, telling the story of Jill Valentine and Chris Redfield. Games featured in this article
